ee anuwa abhiyachanadhikaranaya wisin mita pera karana lada niyogayakata anuwa nithipathiwaraya wisin karunu salaka bala 2016 janawari 25 wani dina ho eeta aasanna dinayakadi homagama mahesthrath adhikaranayedi thamanta kisidu sambandhayak nomathi naduwakadi adhikaranaye gaurawayata abhiyoga kirima anka bi 74.7.10 darana naduwe sakakaruwanta apa laba dena lesata kisidu awasarayakin thorawa illima saha ema naduwe paminilikara parshwaya wenuwen peni siti rajaye jyeshta nithignyawarayata apahasathmaka katha kirima aandukrama wyawasthawe 105 waganthiya yatathe galagoda aththe gnyanasara himiyanta erehiwa chodana hatharak nithipathiwaraya idiripath kaleya.

dhiwara ha jalaja sampath panatha kriyathmaka kirime balayalath niladharin wisin eki balathala kriyathmaka kirimedi owunata badha kirim sambandhayen wana danata pawathina rupiyal 25,000/-ka dada mudala wenuwata rupiyal 50,000/- awama dada mudalakin aarambhawa adala yathrawe diga anuwa balapawathwana aakarayata dada mudala ihala nanwimata haki wana paridi dhiwara ha jalaja sampath panatha sanshodhanaya kirimatath, weralarakshaka balakaye niladharin da panatha kriyathmaka kirima sandaha balayalath niladharin washayen piliganimatath dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathya mahinda amarawira mathithuma idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.

wimarshana warthawen dakwa thibena thawath wadagath karunu kipayak meseya. ■ thundu labima anuwa anathurata bhajanaya wu wedisinhata dewani sthanayath suraj perera hathwani sthanayath laba thibe. ■ tharagaye paswani wataya wana wita wedisinha ha suraj perera karata kara satanaka nirathawa sitiyaha. ■ hayawani wataya aarambhaye palamu harawumedi (wanguwedi) mema tharagakaruwan dedena anathurata bhajanayawima.

kenath jon pendiga්rast – skatola fayinans limitang (singappuruwa), yapa hetti pathirannahalage nishshanka yapa senadhipathi – awangang paudgalika samagama, senarath bandara disanayaka – awangang paudgalika samagama, min shuwan – lenski intarnashanal samagama (honkon), jayakodi aarachchilage dona meriyan sha්rini pamala jayakodi – ga්ranng rayis indasti්ra samagama (chinaya), palawinnege sumith kumaranathunga – empayar star holdins (singappuruwa), pa්rasanna athanesiyas sirimewan rajarathna – awangang samagama, tha්ristan lorens barnang – hotel ayikiyu intar nashanal (thayilantha), nikola dowin hakansan – netwark limitang (sishels), mayikal robat nasmith makpasan – kachayin limitang (bi්rathanya dupath), aarun hayida්ramani saha mona hayida්ramani – stonkroft inwesmants (bi්rathanya dupath), arun pa්rakash mathani – pashan chayina limitang (honkon), mukesh kubchanng – adwani inwesmants (bahamas, ng yin pin – jiniyas kom limitang (singappur), sayiman finch – best chiyars limitang (sha්ri lanka), kithsiri manjula kumara yapa – awannggarng samagama, ka්ristopar rohan martin – ta්ramp ta්raredin limitang (honkon), mohomang siddik mohomang – kalin intarnashanal kampani limitang (honkon) oowasis fayinans limitang, tekloying limitang ha best chiyars limitang yana samagam lankawe samagam lesa sandahanya.

meda mangala samarawiralage katakatha balakaya, fesbuk balakaya ee widiyata katakatha pathurala arala mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma gana wenas aakalpayak haduwa. 1815 pebarawari 18 wanida ee kiyanne hariyatama mita wasara 200kata kalin thamayi, sinhale anthima raju sha්ri wika්rama rajasinhawa, sagawi siti thanin sudu adhirajyawadin wisin alla ganu labuwe, eda eknaligoda mohottala athulu ohuge pirisa thamayi, sudda samaga ee gamanata ekathu wune.
